channel.title: anchovie.art
channel.copyright: all work licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0

item.title: new project and refsheet!
item.description: added a new project: baconboard. this has been a LONG time in the works but is finally in a publishable state. will continue to update and improve the build guide over time. check it out on the projects page! i've also refreshed anchovie's character design a bit; check out hir new refsheet on the about page.

item.title: printable shooting target
item.description: added a new project: advanced pistol shooting diagnostic target (revised 2023 edition). check it out on the projects page!

item.title: new site page: fwends!! and other minor updates
item.description: there's a new page on the website! it's a webring of sorts, so you can check out my pals (who are all super awesome :D). other updates include: added "new" icon for updates, added telegram channel to about page, added/removed some badges, minor grammatical fixes.

item.title: telegram channel live!
item.description: i've set up a telegram channel that mirrors this site's rss feed updates. if you prefer getting info there, check it out!

item.title: 100hr stool
item.description: my first woodworking project, a CNC bar stool. instructions included!

item.title: meowmixes
item.description: a collection of mixtapes exchanged with my friend jacquelyn! each mix is 60-70min and has liner notes.

item.title: Forza Horizon 4 Tuning Guide
item.description: the not particularly essential forza horizon 4 tuning guide! intended for novice tuners to learn the ropes and best practices.

item.title: not-nft
item.description: a small steganography project with my partner, Marzz. designed as a simple, eco-friendly alternative to NFTs.
